main.name: Manuel Bermudez
main.description: I am very profesional with my work and I usually like to learn new ways to solve the problems better than I know. So, I am seeking for new challenges constantly.
main.bio: I like to develope programs for a better life. The responsability and punctuality are very important for me while I am working (no matters if i'm alone or with a group of people). I am always thinking with visionary ideas that can be very useful for everyone. Also, I usually check the final release of the project before we send it because I  think that we should do the things as well as possible.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
